https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3Obn9IR47fjhbtYtNrO7CBSrZ2w.jpg High school student Shun Takahata is bored. Bored with the day-to-day monotony of school and life, he prays for change, for something exciting. Suddenly, he and his classmates are forced to play deadly children's games and facing terrifying creatures from a talking Daruma doll to a sharp-clawed lucky cat. As the Gods Will
